width.description: Define the # of switches in the first row of the game board. The second row automatically contains #+1 switches.

height.description: Define the number of row-pairs of the game board. E.g., setting the default setting of two means that there are four rows in total.

training_levels.description: An array of levels ordered by difficulty, each containing an array of training items.

start_board.description: Define the initial state of the game board (must be aligned with width and height properties).

goal_board.description: Define the goal state of the game board (must be aligned with width and height properties).

max_turn.description: The maximum number of turns the agent is allowed to take in this challenge.

level.description: An array of training items of the same difficulty.
